page.title: 20The Parish Minister
page.content: On the 29th of May we interviewed the local minister,Mr Hodge.He has stayed in{Longside}over 6 years.The people of {Longside}chose him to work in{Longside He came because he wasn't very happy where he was.He has always wanted to be a minister and has been for 19 years.Mr Hodge enjoys living in{ {Longside}because of the environment and people and wishes to live in {Longside}until he retires.His most common service is on a Sunday which is an hour long and there are usually over a 100 people there.Mr Hodge and his organist work out all the hymms they are going to sing each week and they never sing the same song more than once a year.He also goes round prisons helping people and some people that do not go to his church ask for his help.The church he works in is over 150 years old.
